tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mohak has the wonderful ability to put a patient at ease and complete even the most complicated procedures without much fuss. My experience with him was brilliant.
I had visited the doctor earlier also for myself and others and this time also for my younger son. Each time the doctor has done his best by trying to explain the issues and remedies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Mohak was really good in terms understanding my needs and made me feel really comfortable and explained the process really well. I am very satisfied with my treatment and would highly 
recommend the doctor to anyone looking for implants,dentures etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Fantastic doctor! Dedicated to his profession. Explained every bit of the procedure and treatments. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Mohak is patient friendly, explains the issues, discusses the plan of treatment on the day of visit as well as next follow up plan and advices routine care and maintenance with minimal medicines.
He is punctual, has a good practice of follow up call from his office on the day of the visit and goes extra mile to wait on watch before suggesting any surgical intervention.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Anybody who visits a doctor certainly expresses his/her matter of concern, but what makes it important for the patient is to know about the real cause and factors that led to the problem. For me the doctor helped me in identifying the issues, steps to follow and being optimistic!

- Very warm
- Explains the problem well
- Is sensitive to the patient's comfort with specific type of medicines
- Is very patient and does not rush through

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,GIC Tooth Fillings,
review: I was recommended by a very close friend of mine to visit Dr Mohak Ruparel for my tooth problem . I went to him with faith and trust .He is an excellent Doctor, very patient ,humble , polite and knows his work . He makes the patient very comfortable and explains the the whole procedure he is going to follow after checking you . That is what I liked about him and does not force or scare the patient at all. He is very patient and listens to all the queries the patient has and answers them one by one. I am very glad that we have a excellent Dentist in our area where I stay who is extremely good . I would recommend him to all my near and dear ones to go to him. God bless him for his Good work.
